body: Now this is an interesting experiment, wouldn't this be an interesting experiment,

All it takes is for one Jason Voorhees who loves his mama more than anything to just murder everyone.
This is hot and all but what are they gonna do when all these kids from rape become criminals because they grew up with no father and a lot of teenage moms who are not ready to take care of a kid?
Alas if only this were real. Anyways it's in full colour and has multiple women + rape, definitely worth the read.
